price: Hiyo ndiyo Siku ya haki. Basi anaye taka na ashike njia arejee kwa Mola wake Mlezi
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا
footnotes: Hiyo ndiyo siku isiyo na shaka. Basi atakaye na ashike njia ya kwenda kwa Mola wake Mlezi arejee kwa Imani, na a'mali njema.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-yawmu al-ḥaqu faman shāa ittakhadha ilā rabbihi maāban
